name: Jesse L. Barlow
content: Jesse Barlow's Home Page Jesse Barlow's Home Page Jesse Barlow Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering The Pennsylvania State University W315 Westgate Building (formerly the IST Building) University Park, PA 16802-6822 USA E-mail: lastname at cse dot psu dot edu B.A.,Mathematics and Computer Science, University of Kansas ,1977 M.S.,Statistics, Northwestern University,1980 Ph.D.,Computer Science, Northwestern University,1981 Research Interests: Numerical linear algebra, accuracy of computation, applications of linear algebra to signal and image processing To see what I have worked on recently, see my recent papers. For a more comprehensive history of my work, see my resume . Notice E-mail enquiries about attending graduate school at Penn State will be ignored. This is because of the large volume of such e-mails that I get each year. If you are a potential Penn State graduate student and have an interest in my research, send me a letter. You should also check out our graduate program web page. Teaching The Schreyer Honors College I am an honors advisor. CSE/Math 550 -- Numerical Linear Algebra ---10:10--11:00AM MWF, 119 EES Office Hours and Phones Fall 2019. 3--4 pm MWF and by appt. +1-(814) 863-1705 (Office) +1-(814) 865-9505 (Department) +1-(814) 865-3176 (FAX) Software Links Netlib A respository of FREE numerical software. LAPACK A collection of FREE numerical linear algebra routines. MATLAB Commercial Interactive Software for Numerical Computing. Octave A MATLAB compatable freeware language. It comes as part of linux systems. Personal Links �� Pearl S. Buck Foundation and Holt International Children's Services for prospective adoptive parents ( I'm one).
